recipe.title: Homemade Cheese Spread with Garlic and Herbs
instructions: Combine cream cheese, butter, garlic, and salt in the bowl of a food processor. Pulse until smooth. Add parsley and chives and pulse a few times until well combined. Pack mixture into a small bowl, ramekin, or glass jar. Cover and chill at least 30 minutes. Serve with crackers or toasts.
Do Ahead Cheese can be made 5 days ahead. Cover and chill.
